metadata.criteria: Las Vegas/Henderson businesses with 100+ employees, off-Strip, vending-friendly
metadata.rules_applied: VENDTECH-RULES.md - Tier 1 locations prioritized, Strip/car dealerships/bodybuilding gyms excluded
metadata.contact_enrichment_notes: LinkedIn profiles verified via Google search. Phone numbers from Google Maps/company sites. Emails need Apollo/Hunter enrichment - flagged for follow-up. Per VENDTECH-RULES: pop-ins > cold calls, so addresses are primary value.

leads.address: 12300 Bermuda Road, Henderson, NV 89044

contact.title: General Manager / Area Manager
contact.notes: Amazon's largest NV facility (855K sqft). Corporate vendor approval likely needed. Ask for the GM or Facilities contact at the front desk. Per VENDTECH-RULES: pop-in with gift basket.

leads.why_good_fit: TIER 1 - Massive 24/7 warehouse, 1500+ employees on rotating shifts. Workers have limited food options. Break rooms are heavily used. High-demand snack/drink environment.
leads.next_action: Pop-in visit. Ask security/reception for Facilities Manager name. Bring gift basket.

leads.address: 4550 Nexus Way, North Las Vegas, NV 89081

contact.title: General Manager / Area Manager
contact.notes: Large FC in North Las Vegas industrial corridor. Same corporate approach as LAS1.

leads.why_good_fit: TIER 1 - Major fulfillment center, 1000+ employees, 24/7 shifts. Workers trapped on-site during shifts. Break room is the only food option for many.
leads.next_action: Pop-in visit. Cluster with LAS7, VGT1, VGT2 visits (same industrial area).

leads.address: 6001 E Tropical Pkwy, Las Vegas, NV 89115

contact.title: General Manager
contact.notes: Part of the NE Las Vegas industrial cluster with VGT1, VGT2, LAS5.

leads.why_good_fit: TIER 1 - 24/7 warehouse operations, captive workforce during 10-12 hour shifts. Located in industrial zone with no nearby food options.
leads.next_action: Pop-in visit. Same day as LAS6, VGT1, VGT2 (all within 2 miles).

leads.address: 5802 E Tropical Pkwy, Las Vegas, NV 89115

contact.title: General Manager
contact.notes: Industrial cluster location. Multiple Amazon facilities in this zone.

leads.why_good_fit: TIER 1 - Warehouse with hundreds of employees on multi-shifts. Desert location with zero walkable food options. Break room vending is essential here.
leads.next_action: Pop-in visit. Cluster route with other Amazon facilities on Tropical Pkwy.

leads.address: 7970 S Valley View Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89139

contact.title: General Manager
contact.notes: South Las Vegas location, separate from the NE cluster. Good for geographic diversity.

leads.why_good_fit: TIER 1 - South side FC, 24/7 warehouse. Isolated industrial area = high break room usage. Different geographic zone for route clustering.
leads.next_action: Pop-in visit. Good anchor for south LV route.

leads.address: 11500 Bermuda Rd, Henderson, NV 89052

contact.title: General Manager
contact.notes: 650K sqft distribution center. Avg pay $17.60/hr. Good reviews for friendly crew.

leads.why_good_fit: TIER 1 - Large DC in Henderson (West Henderson Desert). 500+ employees, 24/7 shifts. Workers have above-avg pay = higher spending at vending.
leads.next_action: Pop-in visit. Cluster with LAS1 (also on Bermuda Rd).

leads.address: 1121 W Cheyenne Ave, North Las Vegas, NV 89030

contact.title: Hub Manager / Facilities Coordinator
contact.notes: FedEx hubs typically have a local facilities team. Ask for the operations or hub manager.

leads.why_good_fit: TIER 1 - Distribution hub with overnight and early morning shifts. Workers need caffeine and snacks during odd hours. Limited nearby food options.
leads.next_action: Pop-in visit. Ask for Hub Manager or Operations Supervisor.

leads.address: 4155 E Lone Mountain Rd, North Las Vegas, NV 89031

contact.title: Center Manager / Facilities
contact.notes: Major UPS hub for Las Vegas area. Similar to FedEx approach.

leads.why_good_fit: TIER 1 - Major distribution hub, multi-shift operations. Package handlers work physically demanding shifts and need hydration/snacks.
leads.next_action: Pop-in visit. Cluster with FedEx hub (both in N. Las Vegas).

leads.address: 2251 S Decatur Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89102

contact.name: Mike Penosa
contact.title: Sr. Facilities Manager
contact.notes: 380+ LinkedIn connections. Sr. Facilities Manager = PERFECT decision maker for vending/break room amenities. Kennedy Western University grad.

leads.why_good_fit: EXCELLENT - 500+ call center employees in one building, 24/7 operations. Desk workers = heavy snack/drink consumption. Break rooms are social hubs. Facilities Manager already identified on LinkedIn.
leads.next_action: Pop-in with gift basket. Ask for Mike Penosa at reception. Alternatively, LinkedIn message first.

leads.address: 8451 W Post Road, Las Vegas, NV 89113

contact.name: Cc Novak
contact.title: Facilities Manager for T-Mobile Call Center
contact.notes: Facilities Manager specifically for the T-Mobile Call Center in Las Vegas. 20+ connections. Direct decision maker.

leads.why_good_fit: EXCELLENT - Large T-Mobile call center, 500+ employees. Call center workers are sedentary and snack heavily. Break room amenities are key for retention. Facilities Manager identified.
leads.next_action: LinkedIn message to Cc Novak. Pop-in visit with gift basket.

leads.address: Henderson, NV

contact.title: Facilities Manager / Office Manager
contact.notes: Major BPO/call center company with 2,400+ employees in Henderson. Need to identify exact address and contact via LinkedIn search.

leads.why_good_fit: EXCELLENT - 2,400+ employee call center/BPO. Massive break room traffic. Desk workers = high snack/drink consumption. One of the largest call centers in the valley.
leads.next_action: Research exact Henderson address. LinkedIn search for Facilities/Office Manager. Pop-in.

leads.address: 2420 W Horizon Ridge Pkwy, Henderson, NV 89052

contact.title: Office Manager / Facilities
contact.notes: 24/7 answering service/call center. Henderson location. Smaller but 24/7 = constant break room use.

leads.why_good_fit: Good - 24/7 call center in Henderson. Captive workers during shifts. Located in an office park area (Horizon Ridge = commercial corridor).
leads.next_action: Pop-in visit. Ask for Office Manager.

leads.address: 400 Stewart Ave, Las Vegas, NV 89101
leads.shifts: Standard business hours + call center shifts

contact.title: Facilities Manager / Office Manager
contact.notes: Zappos HQ in downtown Las Vegas (former City Hall). Known for employee-centric culture. They may already have extensive amenities. Worth checking.

leads.why_good_fit: Good potential - 1,677 employees at HQ. Employee-centric culture means they invest in amenities. May already have vending but worth checking for upgrade opportunity.
leads.next_action: Research current break room setup. Pop-in visit.

leads.address: 6355 S Buffalo Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89113

contact.title: Facilities Director / VP Operations
contact.notes: Major gaming tech company. LV offices likely have 2000-3000+ local employees across multiple buildings. May have corporate vendor process.

leads.why_good_fit: Large corporate campus with thousands of local employees. Office workers + manufacturing/testing floor. Multiple buildings = multiple machine opportunities.
leads.next_action: LinkedIn search for Facilities Director. Identify campus buildings.

leads.address: 6601 Bermuda Rd, Las Vegas, NV 89119

contact.title: Facilities Manager / Office Manager
contact.notes: Gaming/lottery tech company. Large LV presence. Corporate campus.

leads.why_good_fit: Large tech/gaming company with thousands of LV employees. Corporate campus environment = break rooms for every floor/wing. Office workers consume snacks/drinks daily.
leads.next_action: LinkedIn search for Facilities contact. Pop-in visit.

leads.address: 3993 Howard Hughes Pkwy, Suite 500, Las Vegas, NV 89169
leads.shifts: Standard business hours + global support shifts

contact.title: Office Manager / Facilities
contact.notes: IT support company HQ. Howard Hughes Pkwy office tower. May have office-only break room needs.

leads.why_good_fit: 1,800+ employees at HQ. Tech workers = heavy snack/drink consumers. Howard Hughes Pkwy office area has limited walkable food options.
leads.next_action: Pop-in visit. Ask for Office Manager at front desk.

leads.address: Las Vegas, NV

contact.title: Office Manager
contact.notes: Named #1 Nevada Top Workplace 2025. Growing Las Vegas presence. Need exact address.

leads.why_good_fit: Fast-growing tech company, #1 NV workplace. Tech culture values office amenities. Likely expanding and open to new break room services.
leads.next_action: Research exact LV address. LinkedIn search.

leads.address: 1800 W Charleston Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89102

contact.title: Director of Facilities / Support Services Director
contact.notes: Only Level 1 Trauma Center in LV. Employee break rooms + ER waiting areas. May have existing vending contract - check.

leads.why_good_fit: TIER 1 - 3,000+ employees, 24/7 hospital. ER waiting areas = captive, stressed, hungry people. Employee break rooms on every floor. Massive foot traffic. Rules say Hospital ERs are Tier 1.
leads.next_action: Pop-in visit. Ask for Support Services Director. Check ER waiting area for existing vending.

leads.address: 3186 S Maryland Pkwy, Las Vegas, NV 89109

contact.title: Director of Facilities / Plant Operations Director
contact.notes: HCA Healthcare owned. May need corporate approval. Largest private hospital in NV.

leads.why_good_fit: TIER 1 - 1,750+ employees, 24/7 hospital. Multiple waiting areas. Staff break rooms throughout. Largest private hospital in NV = high traffic.
leads.next_action: Pop-in visit. Ask for Plant Operations or Facilities Director.

leads.address: 5400 S Rainbow Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89118

contact.title: Director of Facilities
contact.notes: UHS owned hospital. Growing area of Las Vegas. Multiple departments.

leads.why_good_fit: TIER 1 - 3,000 employees, 24/7 hospital in growing SW Las Vegas corridor. Staff break rooms + visitor waiting areas. Constant foot traffic.
leads.next_action: Pop-in visit. Ask for Facilities Director.

leads.address: 1050 W Galleria Dr, Henderson, NV 89011

contact.title: Director of Facilities / Plant Operations
contact.notes: Newer hospital in Henderson. Part of The Valley Health System (UHS). Growing rapidly.

leads.why_good_fit: TIER 1 - 24/7 hospital in Henderson. Newer facility may not have established vending contracts yet. Employee break rooms + visitor areas.
leads.next_action: Pop-in visit. Ask for Plant Operations Director. Check for existing vending.

leads.address: 500 S Grand Central Pkwy, Las Vegas, NV 89155

contact.title: Facilities Management Division Director
contact.notes: Massive government complex. 10,000+ county employees across multiple buildings. May require RFP/bid process. Worth investigating procurement process.

leads.why_good_fit: Enormous employee base across multiple buildings. Government workers = stable, daily demand. Break rooms in every department. May need formal procurement process.
leads.next_action: Research Clark County vendor/procurement process. Look for RFP opportunities.

leads.company: City of Las Vegas - City Hall / Municipal Buildings
leads.address: 495 S Main St, Las Vegas, NV 89101

contact.title: Purchasing Director / Facilities Manager
contact.notes: City of Las Vegas municipal complex. May require formal bid. Check purchasing dept website for vendor opportunities.

leads.why_good_fit: 1,500 city employees across multiple buildings. Government = stable daily traffic. Multiple break rooms in city hall, public works, etc.
leads.next_action: Check lasvegasnevada.gov for vendor/purchasing opportunities.

leads.address: 240 S Water St, Henderson, NV 89015

contact.title: Purchasing Manager / Facilities Director
contact.notes: Henderson city government. Growing city = growing workforce. Check vendor registration.

leads.why_good_fit: 1,000+ employees in Henderson government buildings. Close to Kande's geographic base. Multiple facilities including rec centers, public works, etc.
leads.next_action: Register as vendor at cityofhenderson.com. Research procurement process.

leads.company: City of North Las Vegas - Municipal Center
leads.address: 2250 Las Vegas Blvd N, North Las Vegas, NV 89030

contact.title: Purchasing Manager / Facilities
contact.notes: Fastest growing city in NV. New municipal facilities being built. Great timing for new vendor relationships.

leads.why_good_fit: 800+ employees in a rapidly growing city. New facilities = opportunity to be first vendor. Multiple buildings including city hall, police, fire, rec centers.
leads.next_action: Check for vendor registration. Pop-in to city hall.

leads.address: 6226 W Sahara Ave, Las Vegas, NV 89146

contact.title: Facilities Manager / Corporate Services Director
contact.notes: Major utility company, Berkshire Hathaway subsidiary. Corporate campus + field offices. May have corporate vendor approval process.

leads.why_good_fit: 2,500 employees across offices and field locations. Utility workers = steady demand. Corporate campus has multiple break rooms. Berkshire = professional vendor management.
leads.next_action: LinkedIn search for Facilities Manager. Pop-in to Sahara Ave office.

leads.address: 8360 S Durango Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89113

contact.title: Facilities Manager / Office Services
contact.notes: Publicly traded gas utility. HQ in Las Vegas. Corporate environment.

leads.why_good_fit: 2,285 employees, HQ in Las Vegas. Corporate campus environment with break rooms. Utility = stable company, won't disappear. Field crews need grab-and-go options.
leads.next_action: LinkedIn search for Facilities contact. Pop-in visit.

leads.address: 4125 W Diablo Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89118
leads.shifts: Early morning starts, field crews + HQ office

contact.title: Office Manager / Facilities Coordinator
contact.notes: Major paving/construction company. 1,500 employees. HQ has dispatch center + offices. Workers start early (4-5am).

leads.why_good_fit: 1,500 construction employees. HQ dispatch center = early morning traffic, grab-and-go drinks/snacks. Field crews stop by HQ daily. Energy drinks and water sell well here.
leads.next_action: Pop-in visit early morning (5-6am is active). Ask for Office Manager.

leads.address: Las Vegas, NV

contact.name: Brent Gonthier
contact.title: Regional Facilities Manager
contact.notes: Regional Facilities Manager found on LinkedIn. 20+ connections. College of Southern Nevada grad. Direct decision maker for break room amenities.

leads.why_good_fit: Growing solar company with 500+ LV employees. Field crews + office staff. Regional Facilities Manager already identified. Booming solar industry in NV = growth.
leads.next_action: LinkedIn message to Brent Gonthier. Pop-in with gift basket.

leads.address: Las Vegas, NV

contact.title: Office Manager / Facilities
contact.notes: Named #2 Nevada Top Workplace 2025. Large electrical contractor. Need exact LV address.

leads.why_good_fit: Top NV workplace, large electrical contractor. Field crews + office. Workers grab drinks/snacks daily before heading to job sites. Early morning traffic.
leads.next_action: Research exact LV address. LinkedIn search for Office Manager.

leads.address: Las Vegas, NV

contact.title: Operations Manager / Dispatch Center Manager
contact.notes: Major taxi/transport company in Las Vegas. 1,500 employees. 24/7 dispatch center = constant foot traffic. Drivers come and go all day.

leads.why_good_fit: 1,500 taxi/transport employees. 24/7 dispatch center. Drivers stop at base between shifts for snacks/drinks. Break room gets heavy use. Captive during dispatch waits.
leads.next_action: Research dispatch center address. Pop-in visit.

leads.address: 1201 N Town Center Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89144

contact.title: Facilities Director / VP Corporate Services
contact.notes: Allegiant Air HQ in Summerlin area. 4,000+ employees. Corporate offices + training center. May have existing vendor contracts.

leads.why_good_fit: 4,000 employees at HQ. Airlines have massive support staff (reservations, maintenance, training, corporate). Multiple floors = multiple break rooms. Town Center Dr is a newer office area.
leads.next_action: LinkedIn search for Facilities Director. Pop-in to front desk.

leads.address: 1821 Las Vegas Blvd N, North Las Vegas, NV 89030

contact.name: Joni Knauer
contact.title: H.R. Director
contact.notes: HR Director with 120+ LinkedIn connections. Has been Office Manager, Payroll Manager, Sr. Executive VP. Long tenure = knows the building inside out. HR = decides on employee amenities.

leads.why_good_fit: Off-Strip local casino (NOT on the Strip = no monopoly issue). 200+ employees, 24/7. Employee break room is back-of-house. HR Director already identified. Local casino = more approachable than corporate chains.
leads.next_action: Pop-in with gift basket. Ask for Joni Knauer. Perfect size for our machines.

leads.address: Las Vegas, NV

contact.name: Jake Glaspie
contact.title: Vegas Facilities Manager
contact.notes: Vegas Facilities Manager at The Boring Company. 80+ LinkedIn connections. Butte College grad. Direct decision maker for all LV facility amenities.

leads.why_good_fit: Elon Musk's tunnel company with active Las Vegas operations (Vegas Loop). Growing LV presence. Facilities Manager identified. Tech company culture = values employee amenities.
leads.next_action: LinkedIn message to Jake Glaspie. Research LV office/yard location.

leads.address: 4241 S Arville St, Las Vegas, NV 89103
leads.shifts: Standard + early starts for construction equipment

contact.title: Office Manager / Facilities
contact.notes: Equipment rental company HQ. 1,500+ employees. Yard workers + office staff. Early morning activity.

leads.why_good_fit: 1,542 employees at HQ. Equipment rental = yard workers start early, need grab-and-go drinks/snacks. Office staff + mechanic bays = multiple break room locations.
leads.next_action: Pop-in visit during morning hours. Ask for Office Manager.

leads.address: 7000 Lindell Rd, Las Vegas, NV 89118

contact.title: Facilities Manager / VP Operations
contact.notes: Event services company (convention setup, trade shows). HQ in Las Vegas. 3,400 employees. Huge warehouse/staging areas plus offices.

leads.why_good_fit: 3,400 employees in event services. Warehouse + staging areas + offices. Convention season = surge staffing. Workers doing physical setup need hydration/snacks. Large facility.
leads.next_action: Pop-in to Lindell Rd HQ. Ask for Facilities Manager.

north_las_vegas_industrial.description: Amazon LAS6, LAS7, VGT1 + FedEx + UPS + Jerry's Nugget. All within 5-mile radius of E Tropical Pkwy / Cheyenne Ave corridor. Hit all in one morning.

henderson_cluster.description: Amazon LAS1, DLV4 (Bermuda Rd) + Knoah Solutions + Central Communications + Henderson Hospital + City of Henderson. Henderson is home base territory.

south_west_las_vegas.description: Amazon SNV1 + Spring Valley Hospital + Southwest Gas + Las Vegas Paving + GES Global. S Valley View / Rainbow / Lindell corridor.

central_las_vegas.description: TELUS Digital + UMC Hospital + Zappos + Ahern Rentals. Central corridor near Charleston/Decatur area.

summerlin_west.description: T-Mobile + IGT + Allegiant Air + NV Energy. West side / Summerlin corporate area.

high_priority: HT-009 (TELUS - Mike Penosa email via Apollo/Hunter)
HT-010 (T-Mobile - Cc Novak email via Apollo/Hunter)
HT-028 (Las Vegas Paving - Office Manager name/email)
enrichment_needed.notes: Use Apollo.io or Hunter.io to find verified emails for the LinkedIn contacts. For Amazon/FedEx/UPS, pop-in visits are the only realistic path - corporate won't give out facility manager info.
